summary: A small cottage located at Lake Ilinalta. Includes custom storage shelves/areas and a room to change your appearance in.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=+3]-- Lakeview Cottage --[/size][/center]

[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mAeKwSo.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[size=+2]Overview-[/size]
- A small quest to obtain the house.
- Plenty of storage chests.
- 3 Mannequins.
- Weapon Racks/Displays.
- Custom Storage shelves.
- A \"Makeover\" room where you can change your characters appearance.

[size=+2]Custom Storage and \"makeover\" room-[/size]
This house includes custom storage areas where you can store you potions, ingredients, soul gems, shields, arrows and other crafting materials. See pictures for examples.
There is also a room situated in the house, where you can change you appearance (Enter Race Menu). The room is small to reduce the risk of CTD\'s.


[size=+2]Installation-[/size]
NMM (Recommended)-
Download with manager, then activate mod.

MANUAL-
Extract contents of the .7z file into you Skyrim>Data Folder

[size=+2]Other Notes-[/size]
This is my first mod ever, for Skyrim or any other game. I\'ve been learning the CK and Papyrus Scripting from scratch over the last few weeks. If you liked the mod please give me some feedback. If you have any ideas/improvements than let me know. And as always, if you enjoyed it please Endorse!

The mod has been cleaned with TES5EDIT

[size=+2]Credits-[/size]
- SparrowPrince for giving me permission to use his Waterplants from his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13268]W.A.T.E.R[/url] Mod
- Bethesda for creating a awesome game and providing the tools to mod it
- My sister for the custom artwork located in this mod
author: Job4aCowboy
